oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 100 North Main Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color aerial photo image of 100 North Main Building.

“100 N. Main Building -- Memphis, Tennessee -- Tallest prestige office building in the mid-south. Home office of Bloomfield Building Industries, Inc. Houses the exclusive ‘Top-Of-The-100’ Club. 38 stories including a year ‘round swimming pool, rotating penthouse lounge, gymnasium, steam room, two gourmet restaurants, cafeteria, bank and all kinds of shops. Leasing Agent: Cross Country Development Corporation -- 100 N. Main Bldg., Memphis, Tennessee -- 527-4507”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Main Street; North Main Building; downtown; country clubs; skyscrapers; businesses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Paris Agency, 2600 Poplar, Memphis, Tenn.
